Previously I asked about exact vs apply.

I forgot to ask whether exact can be used to apply lemmas from mathlib.

I've only ever seen it used to apply hypotheses which are local to the proof, whereas i've seen apply used for both local hypotheses and imported lemmas.
rzeta0 has marked this topic as resolved.
@rzeta0, by any chance is your project publicly hosted yet?

Derek Rhodes said:

@rzeta0, by any chance is your project publicly hosted yet?

I'm blogging and making videos as I go:

https://leanfirststeps.blogspot.com/p/contents.html

https://www.youtube.com/@LeanFirstSteps/videos

I haven't advertised it lots yet as I keep finding i go back and edit content as my understanding improves.
Fantastic! Your dedication to detail is impressive, almost archeological, very cool to see the exposition evolve from discovery as opposed to theoretical foundations.
